translations.chinese: 君王能與共天下，可立致也。
translations.english: If your majesty can share the world with them, they can be made to come immediately."

translations.chinese: 齊王信之立，非君王 意，信亦不自堅。
translations.english: King Qi Xin's establishment was not your majesty's intention, and Xin himself is not firm.

translations.chinese: 彭越本定梁地，始君王以魏豹故，拜越為相國。
translations.english: Peng Yue originally pacified Liang territory. At first your majesty, because of Wei Bao, appointed Yue as prime minister.

translations.chinese: 今豹死，越亦望王，而君王不早定。
translations.english: Now Bao is dead, and Yue also hopes to become king, but your majesty has not decided early.

translations.chinese: 今能取睢陽以北至穀城皆以王彭越，從陳以東傅海與齊王信， 信家在楚，其意欲復得故邑。
translations.english: Now if you can take Suiyang north to Gucheng and all give it to enfeoff Peng Yue as king, and from Chen east to the sea and give it to King Qi Xin, Xin's family is in Chu, and his intention is to regain his former territory.
